item.description:
Alright boys, here's the word.
The other night Red asked me if I'd mind help organizing the Wingmen with Roca for the New Haven area. I say what better way to organize than a sarge.

Unfortunately, since I fly out for work early as hell Sunday, the only night I can sarge is going to be Friday. And lucky guy that I am this week, I have a meeting at the office in Stamford that night starting at 5. SO... pending my meeting getting out on time and all that fun stuff like traffic, I figure I can get to downtown New Haven at 9:30. FIgure Black Bear is a good spot to meet up.

From there, we can figure out where we want to sarge.

Any questions, let me know on here or IM me on AIM - jcidol@luckymail.com - Yes, put the entire thing including the @ sign.

If we are gonna get to PUA status, then let's go pick up some women dammit.

PS - Any one who can bring a pivot, that'd give us some good exercise too.

JC
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't spot a fellow wingman, there's a problem.
item.name: Friday Night Sarge in New Haven
